sentences.sContent: Furthermore, the detailed recollections of visual awareness in this case were consistent with verified events.
sentences.sContent_eng: Furthermore, the detailed recollections of visual awareness in this case were consistent with verified events.
sentences.sCn: 此外，在这个案例中，视觉意识的细节回忆与已经证实的事件是一致的。

words.tran: 可证实的；能作证的；可检验的

trans.tranCn: 已查清的， 已证实的
